default.error: An error occurred while trying to execute the command.

fields.creator: Creator
fields.description: **Node** is a multipurpose Discord bot that is built with [discord.js](https://github.com/discordjs/discord.js), a powerful [Node.js](https://nodejs.org) module that allows you to easily interact with the [Discord API](https://discord.com/developers/docs/intro).

ban.description: Ban a member from the server.

options.target: The member to ban from the server.

ban.failed: Failed to ban target user bacause
ban.noMember: Target user is no longer a member of this server.
ban.notModeratable: Target user is not moderatable by me.
ban.notManageable: Target user is not manageable by me.
ban.notHighestUserRole: Target user's highest role is higher than your highest role.
ban.notHighestBotRole: Target user's highest role is higher than my highest role.

emit.description: 💬 Emit an discord.js event for debug and dev purposes.

options.member: Select a member to be part of the event.

grab.description: Grabs the current playing song on your DM.
grab.DMfailed: I couldn't send you a DM. Please make sure allow direct messages is turned on.

invite.disabled: Sorry! Invites have been disabled by the owner.
invite.reply: Invite me by clicking the button.

kick.description: Kick a member from the server.

options.target: The member to kick from the server.

kick.failed: Failed to kick target user bacause
kick.noMember: Target user is no longer a member of this server.
kick.notModeratable: Target user is not moderatable by me.
kick.notManageable: Target user is not manageable by me.
kick.notHighestUserRole: Target user's highest role is higher than your highest role.
kick.notHighestBotRole: Target user's highest role is higher than my highest role.

language.description: 🌐 Change your language for the bot.
language.notAvailable: Selected language isn't available at the moment.
language.reply: You have selected `{{language}}` as default language of this server.

logger.noChannel: ⚠ In order to create a loggin system, a text based channel must be provided.
logger.noLogger: ❌ Sorry there is no logging system.
logger.description: Below are given the stats for all logging systems.

loop.description: Loop the current track or the queue

subcommands.off: Set looping for the player to off.
subcommands.track: Set looping for the player to track.
subcommands.queue: Set looping for the player to queue.

lyrics.description: View lyrics for current playing song/track.

memberinfo.description: 📖 View your or any member's information.

options.member: Select a member or leave empty to view your own info.

memberinfo.message: On {{time}}, {{user}} joined as the {{position}} member of {{guild}}.

ping.description: 🏓 Pong! Replies with bot's response time.

play.description: Play songs or tracks from available sources.

options.query: Song name or url to play.
options.play_next: Add a new track to queue to be play it next.

options.file: The audio file you want to play.

subcommands.after: Delete messages that are after a specific message.
subcommands.bots: Delete messages that were sent by bots.
subcommands.commands: Delete messages which are Slash Commands.
subcommands.files: Delete messages which contain files or attachments.
subcommands.user: Delete messages sent by a specific user.

options.amount: Number of messages the bot should delete.
options.message: Message ID or Link to delete messages after.
options.target: Select a user whose message to delete.

purge.noMessage: Couldn't find the message. Please provide a valid `ID` or `Link`.

reload.owner: Sorry, You are not the owner of this application. So, you can't use this command.

remove.description: Removes a track from the queue.

options.number: The track number you want to remove.

role.description: Give | Remove role(s) from server members.

subcommands.give: Gives a role to a user.
subcommands.remove: Removes a role from a user.
subcommands.multiple: subcommand to manage roles for multiple users.

options.action: Wether to give or remove roles.

role.notManageable: I am unable to manage this role | {{role}}
role.notAllowed: You are not allowed to manage this role | {{role}}
role.givenSelected: {{role}} | Given the role to selected members.
role.removedSelected: {{role}} | Removed the role from selected members.

roles.description: 📝 Get the role list of a server.

search.description: Searches for tracks for the query.

options.query: The tracks you want to search.

seek.description: Seeks to a certain time in the track.

serverinfo.name: 📛 Server Name
serverinfo.channelView: To view all server channels use `/channels`
serverinfo.roleView: To view all server roles use `/roles`

skip.description: Skips the current or to a specific track in the queue.

options.number: The number of the track you want to skip to

skip.invalidNumber: Provide a valid number not exceeding the queue length.

stop.description: Stops the music and clears the queue
stop.stopped: Stopped the music and cleared the queue.

timeout.description: Restrict a members ability to communicate.
timeout.failed: Could not timeout member due to
timeout.noMember: Member has most likely left the server.
timeout.invalidTime: Time provided time is invalid or over the 28 days limit.
timeout.notModeratable: Selected target is not moderatable by me.
timeout.notHighestUserRole: Selected target has a higher role position than you.
timeout.notHighestBotRole: Target user's highest role is higher than my highest role.
timeout.error: An error occurred while trying to timeout the target. Error: {{error}}
timeout.timeout:
{{target}} was issued a timeout for **{{duration}}** by {{member}}.
Bringing their total infractions to **{{infractions}}** points.

Reason: **{{reason}}**

queue.description: Queue management commands for the player.

subcommands.view: View the queue of an active player.
subcommands.clear: Clear the queue of an active player.

unban.description: Unban a member from the server.

options.target: The user to unban from the server.

volume.description: Sets the volume of the player.

options.number: The volume you want to set.

volume.tooHigh: The volume can't be higher than {{max}}.
